info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 5:52PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Oneida, north central Otsego and east central Madison Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 552 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Waterville, or 10 miles northeast of Hamilton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Utica, Paris, New York Mills, Augusta, Clinton, New Hartford, Waterville, Oriskany Falls, Bridgewater and Clayville. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 90 near 31. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central New York.
